extendedInfo.description: An Android Application, for kids comprising of both Education & Entertainment in a single app. All the important subjects information are being provided in the Education topic & Stories, Puzzles for the Entertainment of the child is also provided separately in the other section. This is very useful for kids as it has all the data required for them in a very interesting and attractive manner.     IT WORKS FOR BOTH TABLET AND PHONE.Education:In this section we have five subjects they are,1.	English â Alphabets, Grammar, Rhymes and Months & Days.2.	Mathematics â Arithmetic, Geometry, Numbers and Algebra.   3.	Science â Human Body, Living-Nonliving things and Herbivores,            Carnivores Animals.4.	Social â Our Universe, Oceans, Continents, Seven Wonders of the World and National Animals.5.	Technology â Important Inventions and Information about Computers.Entertainment:	In this section we have two subjects they are,1.	Stories â In this we have stories with moral.2.	Puzzles â In this we have Mathematics quiz.***You can use this app without Internet. Install once and Enjoy***                                                                              By                                                                   BSP SOFTWARE.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Nice and neat work with lot of good information...my nephew is loving it ....highly recommended
